channel.title: Files on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Files on TLDRBins

item.title: Find (Windows)
item.description: Windows Show hidden files Get-ChildItem -force Find a file ls -path <PATH> -Filter <FILE> -recurse -erroraction silent where /R <PATH> <FILE> Find a file, with rules dir /s /b /a:-d-h <PATH> | findstr /i /v '<STRING>' +---------------------------------------+ |dir: | |/s : include subfolders | |/b : bare format | |/a:-d-h : exclude directories or hidden| | | |findstr: | |/i : case insensitive | |/v STRING : exclude STRING | +---------------------------------------+

item.title: Grep
item.description: Basic grep '<STRING>' <FILE> Grep from files recursively (e.g from current directory) grep -rni '<STRING>' . Grep from binary grep -a '<STRING>' <FILE> Grep hash from binary with perl regex grep -aPo '[a-fA-F0-9]{32}' <FILE> Grep from binaries recusively (e.g. from /var/log) sudo grep -rHa "<STRING>" /var/log Find unique char of a file cat <FILE> | od -cvA none -w1 | sort -bu | tr -d '\n' | tr -d ' '

item.title: Windows ACLs
item.description: Window ACLs (Access Control Lists) Check ACLs powershell # Check a file/directory icacls <PATH> # Check all files and directories icacls * /C Grant user full control cmd powershell # cmd cmd.exe /c cacls <FILE> /E /G <USER>:F # powershell icacls <FILE> /grant <USER>:F Change owner (WO) cmd # cmd cmd.exe /c takeown /F <FILE> ACLs +---------------------------------------------------+ | F (full access) | | M (modify access) | | RX (read and execute access) | | R (read-only access) | | W (write-only access) | | D (delete) | | RC (read control) | | WDAC (write DAC) | | WO (write owner) | | S (synchronize) | | AS (access system security) | | MA (maximum allowed) | | GR (generic read) | | GW (generic write) | | GE (generic execute) | | GA (generic all) | | RD (read data/list directory) | | WD (write data/add file) | | AD (append data/add subdirectory) | | REA (read extended attributes) | | WEA (write extended attributes) | | X (execute/traverse) | | DC (delete child) | | RA (read attributes) | | WA (write attributes) | | OI (object inherit) | | CI (container inherit) | | IO (inherit only) | | NP (do not propagate inherit) | | I (permission inherited from parent container) | +---------------------------------------------------+
